name: Sree Bharani Hotels
address: No 29-A, Madurai Road Near Railway Station and Bus Stand, Tirunelveli Town, Tirunelveli, Tamil Nadu 627001
description: It is a stone's throw from the Railway Station and close to the main shopping area of the town

name: Hotel Aaryas
description: Good location. Near to junction and city center. South Indian breakfast was tasty. Restaurant was hygienic. Tea and coffee were superb

name: Hotel Blue Star
address: No 36 Madurai Road Near Old Bus Stand, Tirunelveli 627001

Lots of parking space is an advantage. Despite many new hotels in this area blue star hotel is still the favourite for many regulars
